DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleContinuous.description: Amount of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), in continuous unrealized loss position for less than 12 months, without allowance for credit loss. Includes beneficial interest in securitized financial asset.

DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleUnrealized.label: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Unrealized Loss Position
DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleUnrealized.description: Amount of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), in unrealized loss position without allowance for credit loss.

DebtSecuritiesHeldToMaturityMaturityAfte.label: Debt Securities, Held-to-Maturity, Weighted Average Yield, Maturity, after Year 10
DebtSecuritiesHeldToMaturityMaturityAfte.description: Weighted average yield of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) maturing after tenth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

DebtSecuritiesHeldToMaturityMaturityAfte.label: Debt Securities, Held-to-Maturity, Weighted Average Yield, Maturity, after Year 5 Through 10
DebtSecuritiesHeldToMaturityMaturityAfte.description: Weighted average yield of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) maturing in sixth through tenth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

DebtSecuritiesHeldToMaturityMaturityAfte.label: Debt Securities, Held-to-Maturity, Weighted Average Yield, Maturity, after Year One Through Five
DebtSecuritiesHeldToMaturityMaturityAfte.description: Weighted average yield of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) maturing in second through fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

DebtSecuritiesHeldToMaturityMaturityWith.label: Debt Securities, Held-to-Maturity, Weighted Average Yield, Maturity, Year One
DebtSecuritiesHeldToMaturityMaturityWith.description: Weighted average yield of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) maturing in next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

HeldToMaturitySecuritiesAccumulatedUnrec.label: Debt Securities, Held-to-maturity, Accumulated Unrecognized Gain
HeldToMaturitySecuritiesAccumulatedUnrec.description: Amount of accumulated unrecognized gain on investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity).

HeldToMaturitySecuritiesAccumulatedUnrec.label: Debt Securities, Held-to-maturity, Accumulated Unrecognized Loss
HeldToMaturitySecuritiesAccumulatedUnrec.description: Amount of accumulated unrealized loss on investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity).

HeldToMaturitySecuritiesDebtMaturitiesAf.label: Debt Securities, Held-to-Maturity, Amortized Cost, Maturity, Allocated and Single Maturity Date, after Year 5 Through 10
HeldToMaturitySecuritiesDebtMaturitiesAf.description: Amount of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity), with single maturity date and allocated without single maturity date, maturing in sixth through tenth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

HeldToMaturitySecuritiesDebtMaturitiesAf.label: Debt Securities, Held-to-Maturity, Amortized Cost, Maturity, Allocated and Single Maturity Date, after Year One Through Five
HeldToMaturitySecuritiesDebtMaturitiesAf.description: Amount of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity), with single maturity date and allocated without single maturity date, maturing in second through fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

HeldToMaturitySecuritiesDebtMaturitiesAf.label: Debt Securities, Held-to-Maturity, Amortized Cost, Maturity, Allocated and Single Maturity Date, after Year 10
HeldToMaturitySecuritiesDebtMaturitiesAf.description: Amount of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity), with single maturity date and allocated without single maturity date, maturing after tenth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

HeldToMaturitySecuritiesDebtMaturitiesWi.label: Debt Securities, Held-to-Maturity, Amortized Cost, Maturity, Allocated and Single Maturity Date, Year One
HeldToMaturitySecuritiesDebtMaturitiesWi.description: Amount of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity), with single maturity date and allocated without single maturity date, maturing in next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

InterestIncomeDebtSecuritiesAvailableFor.label: Interest Income, Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Operating
InterestIncomeDebtSecuritiesAvailableFor.description: Amount of interest income, amortization of premium and accretion of discount on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale); classified as operating.

InterestIncomeDebtSecuritiesOperating.label: Interest Income, Debt Securities, Operating
InterestIncomeDebtSecuritiesOperating.description: Amount of interest income, amortization of premium and accretion of discount, on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) and investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (trading); classified as operating.

InterestIncomeDebtSecuritiesTradingOpera.label: Interest Income, Debt Securities, Trading, Operating
InterestIncomeDebtSecuritiesTradingOpera.description: Amount of interest income, amortization of premium and accretion of discount, on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (trading); classified as operating.

LoansAssumed1.label: Loans Assumed
LoansAssumed1.description: The fair value of loans assumed in noncash investing or financing activities.

PaymentsToAcquireBusinessesNetOfCashAcqu.label: Payments to Acquire Businesses, Net of Cash Acquired
PaymentsToAcquireBusinessesNetOfCashAcqu.description: The cash outflow associated with the acquisition of a business, net of the cash acquired from the purchase.

DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleRealizedGa.label: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Realized Gain
DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleRealizedGa.description: Amount of realized gain on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleRealizedLo.label: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Realized Loss
DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleRealizedLo.description: Amount of realized loss on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

DebtSecuritiesTradingRealizedGain.label: Debt Securities, Trading, Realized Gain
DebtSecuritiesTradingRealizedGain.description: Amount of realized gain on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (trading).

DebtSecuritiesTradingRealizedLoss.label: Debt Securities, Trading, Realized Loss
DebtSecuritiesTradingRealizedLoss.description: Amount of realized loss on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (trading).

DerivativeAmountOfHedgedItem.label: Derivative, Amount of Hedged Item
DerivativeAmountOfHedgedItem.description: Amount of hedged item in hedging relationship. Excludes hedged asset or liability.

HedgedAssetFairValueHedgeCumulativeIncre.label: Hedged Asset, Fair Value Hedge, Cumulative Increase (Decrease)
HedgedAssetFairValueHedgeCumulativeIncre.description: Amount of cumulative increase (decrease) in fair value of hedged asset in fair value hedge, attributable to hedged risk.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeAvailableforsale.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Available-for-sale Securities Adjustment, Net of Tax, Portion Attributable to Parent
OtherComprehensiveIncomeAvailableforsale.description: Amount after tax and reclassification adjustments, of appreciation (loss) in value of unsold available-for-sale securities, attributable to parent entity. Excludes amounts related to other than temporary impairment (OTTI) loss.

InvestmentIncomeNet.label: Investment Income, Net
InvestmentIncomeNet.description: Amount after accretion (amortization) of discount (premium), and investment expense, of interest income and dividend income on nonoperating securities.

DebtSecuritiesHeldToMaturityTransferAmou.label: Debt Securities, Held-to-maturity, Transfer, Amount
DebtSecuritiesHeldToMaturityTransferAmou.description: Amount of investment in debt security, measured at amortized cost, transferred to investment in debt security, measured at fair value, with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale) and net income (trading).

FairValueOptionCreditRiskGainsLossesOnAs.label: Fair Value, Option, Credit Risk, Gains (Losses) on Assets
FairValueOptionCreditRiskGainsLossesOnAs.description: This item represents the estimated amount of gains or losses included in earnings during the period attributable to changes in instrument-specific credit risk arising from loans and other receivables held as assets.

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityUndiscounte.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, Undiscounted Excess Amount
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityUndiscounte.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payments in excess of discounted obligation for lease payments for operating lease.

LoansHeldForSaleFairValueDisclosure.label: Loans Held-for-sale, Fair Value Disclosure
LoansHeldForSaleFairValueDisclosure.description: Fair value portion of loans held-for-sale including, but not limited to, mortgage loans and finance receivables.

OciDebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleTransfe.label: OCI, Debt Securities, Available-for-Sale, Transfer to Held-to-Maturity, Adjustment from AOCI for Amortization of Gain (Loss), after Tax
OciDebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleTransfe.description: Amount, after tax, of adjustment from accumulated other comprehensive income (loss) for amortization of gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale) from transfer to investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity).

OciDebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleTransfe.label: OCI, Debt Securities, Available-for-Sale, Transfer to Held-to-Maturity, Adjustment from AOCI for Amortization of Gain (Loss), before Tax
OciDebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleTransfe.description: Amount, before tax, of adjustment from accumulated other comprehensive income (loss) for amortization of gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale) from transfer to investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity).

ServicingAssetAtFairValueAmount.label: Servicing Asset at Fair Value, Amount
ServicingAssetAtFairValueAmount.description: Fair value of an asset representing net future revenue from contractually specified servicing fees, late charges, and other ancillary revenues, in excess of future costs related to servicing arrangements.

TierOneLeverageCapitalRequiredForCapital.label: Banking Regulation, Tier One Leverage Capital Ratio, Capital Adequacy, Minimum
TierOneLeverageCapitalRequiredForCapital.description: Ratio of minimum Tier 1 leverage capital to average assets required for capital adequacy as defined by regulatory framework.

CommonStocksIncludingAdditionalPaidInCap.label: Common Stocks, Including Additional Paid in Capital
CommonStocksIncludingAdditionalPaidInCap.description: Amount of par value plus amounts in excess of par value or issuance value for common stock issued.

LoansReceivableHeldForSaleAmount.label: Financing Receivable, Held-for-Sale
LoansReceivableHeldForSaleAmount.description: Amount, before valuation allowance, of financing receivable classified as held-for-sale.

LongTermDebtAndCapitalLeaseObligations.label: Long-term Debt and Lease Obligation
LongTermDebtAndCapitalLeaseObligations.description: Amount of long-term debt and lease obligation, classified as noncurrent.

DividendsCommonStockCash.label: Dividends, Common Stock, Cash
DividendsCommonStockCash.description: Amount of paid and unpaid common stock dividends declared with the form of settlement in cash.

DefinedContributionPlanCostRecognized.label: Defined Contribution Plan, Cost
DefinedContributionPlanCostRecognized.description: Amount of cost for defined contribution plan.

DefinedContributionPlanEmployerDiscretio.label: Defined Contribution Plan, Employer Discretionary Contribution Amount
DefinedContributionPlanEmployerDiscretio.description: Amount of discretionary contributions made by an employer to a defined contribution plan.

DefinedContributionPlanMaximumAnnualCont.label: Defined Contribution Plan, Maximum Annual Contributions Per Employee, Percent
DefinedContributionPlanMaximumAnnualCont.description: Maximum percentage of employee gross pay the employee may contribute to a defined contribution plan.

FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.label: Finance Lease, Liability, Payment, Due
FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payments for finance lease.

FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDueAfterYea.label: Finance Lease, Liability, to be Paid, after Year Five
FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDueAfterYea.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for finance lease to be paid after fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDueNextTwel.label: Finance Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year One
FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDueNextTwel.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for finance lease to be paid in next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDueYearFive.label: Finance Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year Five
FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDueYearFive.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for finance lease to be paid in fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDueYearFour.label: Finance Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year Four
FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDueYearFour.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for finance lease to be paid in fourth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDueYearThre.label: Finance Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year Three
FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDueYearThre.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for finance lease to be paid in third fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDueYearTwo.label: Finance Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year Two
FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDueYearTwo.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for finance lease to be paid in second fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LongTermDebtAndCapitalLeaseObligationsIn.label: Long-term Debt and Lease Obligation, Including Current Maturities
LongTermDebtAndCapitalLeaseObligationsIn.description: Amount of long-term debt and lease obligation, including portion classified as current.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Grants in Period, Gross
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Gross number of share options (or share units) granted during the period.

DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleRealizedGa.label: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Realized Gain (Loss)
DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleRealizedGa.description: Amount of realized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).
